job.title: UPHESC Assistant Professor Recruitment 2021 – Apply Online for 2003 Vacancies in Uttar Pradesh
job.body:
Total vacancies:2003

Name of the Vacancies:

  • Assistant Professor 

Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Master’s degree holders have been published by Uttar Pradesh Higher Education Services Commission for Uttar Pradesh vacancies in Uttar Pradesh. If you are searching for a government job in Uttar Pradesh then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of Assistant Professor, from 01-07-2021, and till 08-07-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in Uttar Pradesh and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • No information about the application fee

Educational qualification:

To apply for an Assistant Professor in UPHESC, your Master’s degree  must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 01-07-2021
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 08-07-2021

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

UPHESC Assistant Professor  Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for UPHESC Assistant Professor Recruitment 2021? 

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the Assistant Professor. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of UPHESC and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by UPHESC
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.

Download Official notification pdf.
